alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 10:30AM CDT until May 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, MAY 30... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...Until Monday, May 30. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain between 24.0 feet and 25.0 feet over the next few days. Heavy rainfall is expected over the next several days, therefore additional rises are possible into next week. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 24.6 Sat 9 AM 24.5 24.9 24.8 25.0 7 PM 5/23 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
